name: Ancient Jumper
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT!

Feel free to give feedback! I am open for it and also ready to implement new ideas, to fix bugs, and etc.

A "Doodle Jump" like game for your smartphone.

 A really fun game to waste time. Jump through the ancient world/s. Beat your highscore by jumping through the jungle (and through different worlds in the future ). Survive and collect coins to use in shop. (Shop is underconstruction).

This game started out as a school project. I really loved it and I would like to work on it more and maybe even publish it in the future. Therefore I wanted to share it with you guys! 

I hope you like it and ENJOY!

:)
